Scene transition with background music and visuals of the stage.

subtitles.english: Loo-ser! ♡ Loo-ser! ♡ Loo-ser! ♡ Loo-ser! ♡

subtitles.original: ...なんで手札出さねえの？
subtitles.english: Why aren't you playing your hand?

subtitles.original: ひょっとしてひよってんの？
subtitles.english: Are you getting cold feet?

subtitles.original: まじくっそだせえな
subtitles.english: You're so freaking pathetic.

subtitles.original: あ・く・し・ろ・よ。
subtitles.english: Hurry. Up. and. Go.

subtitles.original: 《舌打 ちざござご ASMR》
subtitles.english: 《Tongue clicking/Za-go-za-go ASMR》

subtitles.original: ね、早く出そ？
subtitles.english: Hey, hurry up and play it.

subtitles.original: もし私に勝ったら この奴の言うことを
subtitles.english: If you win against me, I'll do whatever...

subtitles.original: なんでも聞いてあげるよ♡
subtitles.english: ...this person tells me to! ♡

subtitles.original: ...まあ 勝てないけど♡ (笑)
subtitles.english: ...Well, not that you could win! ♡ (LOL)

subtitles.original: 噛ませ犬に抜擢！ よわよわこやつぁ♡
subtitles.english: Promoted to underdog! This weakling! ♡

subtitles.original: 所詮... 先の時代の敗北者♡
subtitles.english: After all... just a loser from the previous era! ♡

subtitles.original: たわいない最終回 頼るの？
subtitles.english: Clinging to a silly series finale?

subtitles.original: ざぁーこ♡ ざぁーこ♡ ざぁーこ♡ ざぁーこ♡
subtitles.english: Loo-ser! ♡ Loo-ser! ♡ Loo-ser! ♡ Loo-ser! ♡

subtitles.original: 負けちゃお？♡ 負けちゃお？♡
subtitles.english: Wanna lose? ♡ Wanna lose? ♡

subtitles.original: ね、みじめに生き恥さらさせちゃお？♡
subtitles.english: Hey, wanna be exposed in miserable shame? ♡

subtitles.original: 出せ 出せ 出せ 出せ 敗北宣言ぶちまけろっ！！
subtitles.english: Show it! Show it! Spit out your declaration of defeat!!

subtitles.original: (Vocalizing)
subtitles.english: (Vocalizing)

subtitles.original: ラブと情愛 罰症はないない
subtitles.english: Love and affection, no penalties

subtitles.original: 君だけが毒滅じゃないんだ
subtitles.english: You're not the only one who's unique

subtitles.original: 反省とか私に求められても
subtitles.english: Even if you ask me to reflect on myself

subtitles.original: 本当、病んだり勘違いしないでっ
subtitles.english: Seriously, don't get depressed or misunderstand me

subtitles.original: どうしてなんで大概の立ち回りは滑るの？
subtitles.english: Why does almost every move fall flat?

subtitles.original: さいしょに無理やめ時なんて伝えたじゃん
subtitles.english: I told you from the start it was impossible, right?

subtitles.original: お純情様 散らが手口ですが
subtitles.english: My pure-hearted one, being messy is my style

subtitles.original: やっぱ 会いたくないのですが
subtitles.english: As expected, I don't really want to see you

subtitles.original: ハムステ一 ワンモアチャンス
subtitles.english: Hamster, one more chance

subtitles.original: もうやっぱ びったらびったらいいじゃん
subtitles.english: Well, it's fine if it's all messy

subtitles.original: ポップなアイブだったらいいじゃん
subtitles.english: It's fine if it's a pop-style vibe

subtitles.original: みっともないから嫉妬しないでニャ
subtitles.english: It's unsightly, so don't be jealous, nya

subtitles.original: 寂しくなったら誰でもいいじゃん
subtitles.english: If you're lonely, anyone will do

subtitles.original: 生まれればいいじゃん 隣がいいじゃん
subtitles.english: It's fine as long as we're born, being next to you is fine

subtitles.original: いやいや愛していかなくちゃなんて
subtitles.english: No, no, having to love each other...

subtitles.original: 死ぬまでぴょんぴょんやってんの
subtitles.english: ...we'll be hopping along until we die

subtitles.original: やっぱ びったらびったらいいじゃん
subtitles.english: Well, it's fine if it's all messy

subtitles.original: バットなダンサーハマったらいいじゃん
subtitles.english: It's fine if you fall for a bad dancer

subtitles.original: やっぱり好きとかやってらんねーわ
subtitles.english: I can't deal with that "I love you" stuff

subtitles.original: わかんない明後日そーでー
subtitles.english: I don't know, maybe the day after tomorrow
